Work Experience.Description:
Worked as a teacher on call in the Surrey district. I typically cover Science and BASES classes. BASES is a program that helps students with learning or physical disabilities.
  • Worked in classes such as science, math, English, and tech.
  • Developed new material for the classroom and science labs.
  • Worked with complex students to assist them in their individual needs.

<li>Designed a web page for the Science World website that contains compiled resources for educators to use inside the classroom, and during field trips to Science World.<li>Assisted with inquiry-based workshops for numerous grades on field trips.<li>Performed multiple chemistry demonstrations to elementary classes.<li>Collaborated with Science World administration by discussing options and limitations for the web page.<li>Rotated through various science-based galleries while assisting guests with their queries.
